HERO_SUBTITLE: Keep your health records always safe and up to date. Take control of your data, whether at the clinic, schools or whilst travelling.
WHY_DIGITAL_WALLET_TITLE: Why use a Digital Vaccination Card?
WHY_DIGITAL_WALLET_SUBTITLE: Keep your vaccination records safe, anywhere.
WHY_DIGITAL_WALLET_SUBTITLE_ITEM_1: Don't worry about keeping paper cards anymore once you have a secure digital application.
WHY_DIGITAL_WALLET_SUBTITLE_ITEM_2: Get reminders before any new vaccine is due at your mailbox and PUSH
WHY_DIGITAL_WALLET_SUBTITLE_ITEM_3: Immunie AI keeps the vaccination calendars of 34 countries always updated automatically.
PRIVACY_SUBTITLE: Immunie is privacy by design application, built to be compliant with both the UK Data Protection Act (2018), the General Regulation of Data Protection European (GDPR EU 2016/679) and the California Data Protection Act (CDPA / 2018).
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: Easy, simple and without the need to download another application taking up memory on your phone.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_1: Create your account online in less than 1 minute by clicking here.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_2: When you first log in, you should choose the plan that better fits you.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_3: Ready! You can start using it now, check the updated vaccination calendar and share your card with your school. Welcome!
WHERE_TO_USE_TITLE: Make your life easier with Immunie. No paper, no worries.
WHERE_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_1: Just connect your digital wallet to your clinic to allow your GP to register new vaccines
WHERE_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_2: Share the vaccination card, health questionnaire and emergency contacts with your school in just one click.
WHERE_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_3: There is no need for queuing at the airport anymore. Use a safe digital certificate to share your health tests and check-in from home using Immunie.
WHERE_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_4: Have a better and safer experience and save time connecting the test result to the electronic ticket issuer.
WHERE_TO_USE_RIGTH_CARD_1_SUBTITLE: Check here the list of States and Municipalities with laws on the digital vaccination card and presentation on registration.
BLOCKCHAIN_TECH_SUBTITLE: We use two layers of strong encryption to ensure that you have full control of your data and that your vaccination records and test results are safe. Immunie proprietary technology allows you to authenticate those records' data integrity without compromising your privacy.
INTEGRATION_SUBTITLE: We work with the best technology and the best service providers in the global market.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_1_SUBTITLE: We are proud to be part of the 2020-2021 edition of the London Business School Incubator, one of the best business schools in the world.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_2_SUBTITLE: The most secure, comprehensive and reliable global cloud infrastructure for applications.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_3_SUBTITLE: Progressive Web Apps represents one of the biggest bets for companies like Google and Microsoft for the future.
PRICING_SUBTITLE: Stay up to date, keep your records safe, control your permissions, and use your digital vaccination card anywhere in the world.
VACCINATION_PROGRAM_SUBTITLE: Immunie has 34 different national calendars always updated in our database. Check below some of our sources of information for the UK, the US and Australia vaccination schedules.
WHICH_PLAN_TITLE: What's the best plan for me?
WHICH_PLAN_CARD_1_SUBTITLE: Calendar is always up to date and securely integrates with schools.
WHICH_PLAN_CARD_2_SUBTITLE: Save your information, get reminders and travel smoothly with certificates translated into 12 languages
